title: Important question regarding counselling
content: Will any jee mains seat be vacant in pes for the 2nd round of counselling, since people with better college options would ditch the seat in pes?

comments.body:
i feel even if there are any seats vacant from jee mains quota they would just sell it through management quota  
apparently last year some of the second round pessat seats were sold secretly through management quota
All modes of admission have a separate and independent number of seats. Just because there are empty seats from JEE, they cannot be added to PESSAT. These empty seats are usually given away to MQ.
